creator: tbernert@c1-fse.de
text:
The client doesn't support a easy SSL protocol. 
New feature:
It is possibility to use the client with an easy SSL protocoll. Start the 
client with commandline option -s. The easy SSL protocol accept every 
certificate coming from server without verify.

Created attachment 11395
Implementation of easy SLL protocol
creator: tbernert@c1-fse.de

text: Patch applied in HEAD branch only
